DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Squalamine lactate may stop slow growth ovarian cancer stop blood flow tumor . Drugs use chemotherapy use different way stop tumor cell divide stop grow die . Combining squalamine lactate carboplatin may kill tumor cell . PURPOSE : Phase II trial study effectiveness combine squalamine lactate carboplatin treat patient recurrent refractory stage III stage IV ovarian cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Squalamine Lactate Plus Carboplatin Treating Patients With Recurrent Refractory Stage III Stage IV Ovarian Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine response rate time progression patient recurrent refractory stage III IV ovarian cancer treat squalamine lactate carboplatin . II . Determine safety profile regimen patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive carboplatin IV 15-30 minute day 1 squalamine lactate IV continuously day 1-5 . Treatment repeat every 3 week 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow approximately 1 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 45 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically confirm stage III IV ovarian cancer Refractory disease Progression prior primary paclitaxel carboplatin OR Resistant disease Recurrence within 12 month initial response completion prior paclitaxel carboplatin Recurrence within 12 month initial response prior secondary tertiary regimen allow Bidimensionally measurable evaluable disease OR Elevated CA125 level CA125 least 100 U/mL ( rise prior low level ) OR CA125 great 50 U/mL less 100 U/mL ( least double prior low level ) No know brain metastasis unless clinically stable treatment prior surgery and/or radiotherapy PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 18 Performance status : ECOG 01 OR SWOG 01 Life expectancy : Not specify Hematopoietic : WBC least 4,000/mm3 OR Absolute neutrophil count least 1,500/mm3 Platelet count least 100,000/mm3 Hepatic : Bilirubin great 2 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) AST le 5 time ULN Renal : Creatinine great 1.5 mg/dL OR Creatinine clearance least 60 mL/min Cardiovascular : No significant cardiac disease No uncontrolled high blood pressure No unstable angina No congestive heart failure No myocardial infarction within past year No serious cardiac arrhythmia require medication Other : No clinically significant neuropathy No active malignancy No uncontrolled serious active infection No uncontrolled diabetes mellitus No condition would preclude study Not pregnant nursing Negative pregnancy test Fertile patient must use effective contraception least 30 day study PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : No prior biological response modifier No prior antiangiogenesis agent No prior squalamine lactate No concurrent growth factor , except epoetin alfa Chemotherapy : See Disease Characteristics Received 13 prior chemotherapy regimens ovarian cancer At least 5 year since prior chemotherapy malignancy Endocrine therapy : Concurrent hormonal therapy allow therapy initiate least 6 month prior study Radiotherapy : See Disease Characteristics Recovered prior radiotherapy At least 5 year since prior radiotherapy malignancy No prior radiotherapy area measurable evaluable disease unless site subsequent disease progression Concurrent localize radiotherapy pain symptom relief allow method ineffective measurable and/or evaluable disease remain outside radiotherapy portal Surgery : See Disease Characteristics Other : At least 30 day since prior investigational therapy No prior enrollment study No concurrent antitumor treatment No concurrent investigational therapy
